results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@Lisinopril@@@-Induced @DISEASE_Angioedema @DISEASE_MESH:D000799 @@@Small Bowel Angioedema@@@: An Unusual Cause of Severe @<m>DISEASE_Abdominal_Pain</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D015746 @@@Abdominal Pain@@@

results.title: A Rare Cause of Abdominal Pain: Intestinal Angioedema
results.text_hl: The authors describe a case of a 28-year-old @SPECIES_9606 @@@woman@@@ medicated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ 2 months before, with @<m>DISEASE_Abdominal_Pain</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D015746 @@@abdominal pain@@@ associated with @DISEASE_Nausea @DISEASE_MESH:D009325 @@@nausea@@@, @DISEASE_Vomiting @DISEASE_MESH:D014839 @@@vomiting@@@ and a onetime watery stool.

citations.NLM: Ferreira TA, Alves MR, Oliveira AMP, Silva FSS, Pereira C. A Rare Cause of Abdominal Pain: Intestinal Angioedema J Med Cases. 2021 Apr;12(4):138-140. PMID: 34434446
citations.BibTeX: @article{34434446, title={A Rare Cause of Abdominal Pain: Intestinal Angioedema}, author={Ferreira TA and Alves MR and Oliveira AMP and Silva FSS and Pereira C}, journal={J Med Cases}, volume={12}, number={4}, pages={138-140}}

results.title: A Case of Angiotensin-Converting Enzyme (ACE) Inhibitor-Induced Small Bowel Angioedema
results.text_hl: Her symptoms improved with cessation of @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ although she did experience @<m>DISEASE_Abdominal_Pain</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D015746 @@@abdominal pain@@@ only once shortly after her treatment regimen was changed.

citations.NLM: Pirzada S, Raza B, Mankani AA, Naveed B. A Case of Angiotensin-Converting Enzyme (ACE) Inhibitor-Induced Small Bowel Angioedema Cureus. 2023 Oct;15(10):e47739. PMID: 38022184
citations.BibTeX: @article{38022184, title={A Case of Angiotensin-Converting Enzyme (ACE) Inhibitor-Induced Small Bowel Angioedema}, author={Pirzada S and Raza B and Mankani AA and Naveed B}, journal={Cureus}, volume={15}, number={10}, pages={e47739}}

results.title: ACE Inhibitor Induced Isolated Angioedema of the Small Bowel: A Rare Complication of a Common Medication
results.text_hl: She was managed conservatively, and @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ was discontinued.

citations.NLM: Squillante MD, Trujillo A, Norton J, Bansal S, Dragoo D. ACE Inhibitor Induced Isolated Angioedema of the Small Bowel: A Rare Complication of a Common Medication Case Rep Emerg Med. 2021;2021():8853755. PMID: 33628527

results.title: Isolated intestinal type angioedema due to ACE-inhibitor therapy
results.text_hl: A 42-year-old @SPECIES_9606 @@@woman@@@ presents with @<m>DISEASE_Abdominal_Pain</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D015746 @@@abdominal pain@@@ after taking her first dose of @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@.

results.title: Drug-induced isolated visceral angioneurotic edema.
results.text_hl: The @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@'s @<m>DISEASE_Abdominal_Pain</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D015746 @@@abdominal pain@@@ was thought to be due to isolated @DISEASE_Angioedema @DISEASE_MESH:D000799 @@@visceral angioneurotic edema@@@ induced by @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ and/or @CHEMICAL_Valsartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068756 @@@valsartan@@@, and medication of these two drugs was therefore stopped.

citations.NLM: Arakawa M, Murata Y, Rikimaru Y, Sasaki Y. Drug-induced isolated visceral angioneurotic edema. Intern Med. 2005 Sep;44(9):975-8. PMID: 16258215
citations.BibTeX: @article{16258215, title={Drug-induced isolated visceral angioneurotic edema.}, author={Arakawa M and Murata Y and Rikimaru Y and Sasaki Y}, journal={Intern Med}, volume={44}, number={9}, pages={975-8}}

results.title: ACE inhibitor-induced intestinal angio-oedema: rare adverse effect of a common drug.
results.text_hl: The author reports a @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ presenting with a 1-day history of severe @<m>DISEASE_Abdominal_Pain</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D015746 @@@abdominal pain@@@. The @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ was started on @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ 2 days prior to this presentation.

citations.NLM: Shahani L. ACE inhibitor-induced intestinal angio-oedema: rare adverse effect of a common drug. BMJ Case Rep. 2013 Jul 22;2013():. PMID: 23878294

results.title: ACE inhibitor-associated intestinal angioedema in orthotopic heart transplantation
results.text_hl: A 36-year-old Caucasian @SPECIES_9606 @@@woman@@@ presented with severe diffuse @<m>DISEASE_Abdominal_Pain</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D015746 @@@abdominal pain@@@ one day following initiation of @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ for @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@.

citations.NLM: Srinivasan D, Strohbehn GW, Cascino T. ACE inhibitor-associated intestinal angioedema in orthotopic heart transplantation ESC Heart Fail. 2017 Aug;4(3):384-386. PMID: 28772029
